name: Shave Scuttle + Shave Soap
description:
A collaboration in design with a great pottery maker in Memphis brings a limited number of Copenhagen Shaving Scuttles to my shop for the holidays. A beautiful shaving mug available in black or cream. What's a great shaving scuttle without a great bar of natural shave soap? Your choice of Cedarwood + Bergamot or Bay Rum.

Give your skin the care it deserves with this gentle all natural organic shave soap and beard wash. Made with Cambrian Blue Clay imported from Siberia, this soap detoxifies the skin and regenerates skin cells. It carries a blend of cedarwood and bergamot essential oils for a classic woodsmen scent. This 3.2 oz bar produces big lather for a close shave. If you are one of our beloved bearded customers this soap makes a great shampoo to use once a week on your beard.

Box label is handstamped with Grizzly Bear image. Stamp created by Patti's Paper Craft

Ingredients: saponified organic olive oil, organic sunflower oil, organic coconut oil, organic castor oil, organic cocoa butter, beer, clay, and essential oils.

name: Gift Set
description:
Give a gift that keeps on giving! This handmade all natural bath and body gift set is the perfect solution to fulfill your gifting needs. It includes a handmade soap bar, solid lotion and lip balm. Best of all, you can choose the scents for each component to custom tailor this gift set for your recipient. Each one of our products are made from only the finest ingredients that will nourish your body while invigorating your spirit. If you are looking for a great gift idea that is meant to impress, let Soap Revolt take the stress out of gift-giving. Simply select the fragrances for each component and we'll do the rest. We can even mail it directly to your recipient along with a handwritten gift card on your behalf. This all natural bath and body gift set can be given as a birthday gift, anniversary gift or even to commemorate a special holiday. The possibilities are endless! Now comes in a handstamped drawstring gift bag.


Please include lip balm and lotion choice in notes when placing your order :

Lip Balm: Peppermint, Lavender + Vanilla, Cappuccino, or Mango Peach

Lotion: Lavender, Lavender + Mint, Fresh Citrus, Orange Blossom,  or Vetiver +Vanilla

name: Healing Balm Organic
description:
A Must have for Winter. Cracked heels? This balm will have them healed and soft within a few days. This little tin lasts a long time.
 
A must have balm for healing up cracked lips, hands, feet, severe dry patches, minor cuts/scrapes/burns, itchy bug bites and more!

This small portable tin will last a long time. Rub a small amount of balm onto troubled area a few times a day. 

"Hey Jean - We have been using your healing balm on my daughter's hands that were really cracked and dried out. We have tried all different types of lotions and vaseline in the past, but nothing worked. In just a week, her hands are almost all cleared up. Congrats on a great product." Barb C.
 
2oz volume

name: Men's Gift Set
description:
Give a gift that keeps on giving! This handmade all natural gift set is the perfect solution for the bearded man in your life.

It includes a handmade soap bar, beard oil, and peppermint lip balm. Each one of our products are made from only the finest ingredients that will nourish your body while invigorating your spirit. 

If you are looking for a great gift idea that is meant to impress, let Soap Revolt take the stress out of gift-giving. Simply select the soap scent and we'll do the rest. We can even mail it directly to your recipient along with a handwritten gift card on your behalf. 
This all natural gift set can be given as a birthday gift, christmas gift, anniversary gift or even to commemorate a special holiday. The possibilities are endless! Now comes in a handstamped drawstring gift bag.

Ships Priority Mail to US addresses.
International Mail will be refunded any postage overages

name: Beard Oil CedarWood
description:
Nurture your beard and keep it in optimal condition with this 100% natural organic beard oil. Custom hand blended from only the finest oils, this beard oil is ideal for anyone with a full beard or even someone just starting to grow a beard.
 
The luxurious oils nourish the beard and seep down into the skin to relieve dryness and itchiness. It softens even the sharpest whiskers and makes them kissably soft. Most importantly, it will make your beard stronger and resistant to breakage.
 
Very lightly scented with Cedarwood essential oil for the woodsman. This is a must-have product for the beard aficionado. It also works well as a shaving oil. It is a custom handmade original from Soap Revolt.

Makes a great gift for Christmas or Hanukkah
 
Place a few drops into the palm of your hand, rub hands together, massage thru facial hair and skin underneath.
 
2 oz bottle with dropper - this bottle will last 6 months if not longer. Can also be used as a pre-shave oil
 
Ingredients: calendula infused organic oils of jojoba, argan, grapeseed, castor, and essential oil

name: Shave & Beard Wash - Cedarwood
description:
Give your skin the care it deserves with this gentle all natural organic shave soap and beard wash. Made with Cambrian Blue Clay imported from Siberia, this soap detoxifies the skin and regenerates skin cells. It carries a blend of cedarwood and bergamot essential oils for a classic woodsmen scent. This 3.2 oz bar produces big lather for a close shave. If you are one of our beloved bearded customers this soap makes a great shampoo to use once a week on your beard.

Box label is handstamped with Grizzly Bear image. Stamp created by Patti's Paper Craft

Ingredients: saponified organic olive oil, organic sunflower oil, organic coconut oil, organic castor oil, organic cocoa butter, beer, clay, and essential oils.

name: Mango Peach Lip Balm
description:
All natural lip balm
Soothe and moisturize your lips naturally. Made with organic shea butter and cocoa butter that glides on, hydrates, and seals in moisture like no other! Your lips will feel amazing!

If you are using a lip balm that's not ALL natural throw it out and order one of these. Besides being packed with all things that are good; our lip balm will not dry out your lips requiring continuous application.

These also make great favors for parties, weddings, etc. Contact me if you'd like a custom label for your favors.
 
Ingredients: organic QAI cocoa butter, organic shea butter, organic beeswax, organic sweet almond oil, flavor oil, and vitamin E.

Shipping:
I ship the same day or next day after your order is placed. I don't like waiting for all the lovely items I order online so I don't want you to wait either!

name: Rose Toner
description:
Most coveted of all hydrosols. This Rose Toner works beautifully to help restore mature skin but it's also excellent for all skin types; even sensitive skin. Mild astringent & humectant.

Use after cleansing or during the day for a mental pick me up. Such a beautiful scent of rose envelopes the skin.

2oz with fine mist spritzer
Ingredients: Organic Rose Hydrosol

name: Shave & Beard Wash - Black Vetiver
description:
Give your skin the care it deserves with this gentle all natural organic shave soap and beard wash. Made with Bamboo Charcoal this soap detoxifies the skin by removing dirt and toxins. It carries a blend of vetiver and bergamot essential oils for dark and alluring scent. This 3.2 oz bar produces big lather for a close shave. If you are one of our beloved bearded customers this soap makes a great shampoo to use once a week on your beard.

Box label is handstamped with Grizzly Bear image. Stamp created by Patti's Paper Craft

Ingredients: saponified organic olive oil, organic sunflower oil, organic coconut oil, organic castor oil, organic cocoa butter, beer, bamboo charcoal, and essential oils.

name: Mustache Wax
description:
Movember is just around the corner!

All natural mustache wax that is free of petroleum products. 
I've added a bit of jojoba oil to condition while it's holding your stylish mustache.

It's LIGHTLY scented with with hints of roasted tea leaves, sicilian lemon, southern orange, star jasmine, white cedarwood, amber crystal, black tea leaves, and dash of pink grapefruit. It's a very sexy, unusual, and sophisticated smell.

Bringing you a fresh, all natural, handmade product.
Approx - 1 - 1.25 oz tin

name: Beard Oil Southern Sexy
description:
Nurture your beard and keep it in optimal condition with this 100% natural organic beard oil. Custom hand blended from only the finest oils, this beard oil is ideal for anyone with a full beard or even someone just starting to grow a beard. 

The luxurious oils nourish the beard and seep down into the skin to relieve dryness and itchiness. It softens even the sharpest whiskers and makes them kissably soft. Most importantly, it will make your beard stronger and resistant to breakage. 

This is a must-have product for the beard aficionado. It also works well as a shaving oil. It is a custom handmade original from Soap Revolt.

Lightly scented with our "Southern Sexy" blend; Hints of cedarwood, amber, Sicilian lemon, southern orange, jasmine, and a dash of pink grapefruit.

Place a few drops into the palm of your hand, rub hands together, massage thru facial hair and skin underneath.

2 oz bottle with dropper - this bottle will last 6 months if not longer. Can also be used as a pre-shave oil

Ingredients: calendula infused organic oils of jojoba, argan, grapeseed, castor, and essential oils

description:

It includes a handmade soap bar, mustache wax, beard oil, and peppermint lip balm. Include note during checkout for beard oil selection (Cedarwood, Southern Sexy, or Unscented)

name: Beeswax Candle
description:
100% Beeswax candle in a 4 oz lidded tin which is great for traveling. Burns approx 20 hours. Beeswax is a cleaner burn. These are hand poured and available for the holidays.

Beeswax candles give off negative ions that remove dust, dirt, odors, and other pollutants from the air we breathe.


Offered in:

Ming Fern + Lavender - balances base notes of Ming Fern with herbal blue lavender, Italian mandarin, red ginger, earthy Indonesian patchouli, oak moss, gentle Aloe Vera, Kaffir lime and Argentina lemon leaf

Mangosteen + Grapefruit - citrus punch, a hint of peach, and a naturally derived sweetness

Nutcracker - blend of Vanilla, Hazelnut, Maple Syrup, Banana, Coconut, Lime, Orange, Grapefruit, Bergamot, Clove

Green Tee + Lemongrass - bright and natural smelling citrus begins with a top note of orange Valencia, bergamot tea and plum wine. The heart combines jasmine, violet, lavender and orange flowers. The dry down is a clean citrus musk.

Love Spell - luscious fusion of citrus, cherry blossom, hydrangea, apple and peach; with a hint of blondewood.

Unscented - warm sweet smell of pure honey cleanest burning candle available on the market
______________________________________________
Shipping
Allow up to 3 days before shipping when ordering candles. These are hand poured on order.

name: Natural Deodorant
description:
100% Natural Deodorant
Ditch the harmful chemical deodorant and switch to a worry free, simple and effective option. Formulated to stop bacteria to keep you smelling fresh. It's not an antiperspirant. We are designed to sweat in order to rid ourselves of toxins; this is a good thing! Embrace it. Reapply as needed. You won't, however, get those ugly yellow stains on your clothes. Why not you ask? Those stains are not caused by sweat but by chemicals in commercial deodorant. Which you won't find here!

Offered in: (2.45oz)
Tea Tree + Lemongrass
Cedarwood + Tea Tree
Jasmine

Mini - travel - trial size (.45 ounce)
Tea Tree + Lemongrass (TTLG)
Cedarwood + Tea Tree (CW)
Jasmine

name: Pumpkin Soap
description:
My Pumpkin soap was so good that it demanded to be loved all year long; not just in the fall. Who am I to say no?!

A luxurious soap featuring Organic Pumpkin Seed Butter which is rich in vitamin E and beta carotene. Pumpkin is known to prevent cell damage and repair skin. This is a must have for troubled, mature, or delicate skin. Extraordinary as a face wash. Top recommended soap for babies and children as well. The beautiful yellow color comes from the addition of organic pumpkin puree. 

This soap has a light scent from the pumpkin butter and pumpkin puree. No essential oils were added for scent. Produces amazing lather.

Bringing you fresh, handmade, all natural soap using organic ingredients that is safe and gentle. Suitable for all skin types; even the most sensitive skin. Can be used as a body and face soap.

4 oz bar

Ingredients: saponified; organic olive oil, organic sunflower oil, organic coconut oil, organic cocoa butter, organic pumpkin seed butter, organic castor oil, purified water, and organic pumpkin puree 

Customer Feedback

-this soap is fabulous. I am amazed. my itchy rash just dissapeared. I am so chuffed. thank you, thank you. I am now ordering some more. 

-I really like using this as my morning soap. I use the healing balm with it and it is such an amazing combination! I tried using LUSH products before but my skin got soooo rough! All of these products make your skin so soft and clean! My complexion is more clear also, so I have started using less make up! WIN-WIN-WIN!!!

"I ordered Big Pumpkin soap from Soap Revolt Naturals for my son, Sid. I have to say I am very impressed! Sid has eczema. For those who don't know what that is, it is extremely dry skin. He has to use special medicated lotion & salve every day. Since using the all natural pumpkin soap he has not had to use lotion at all & has not been itchy. It also has a wonderful scent. I am really excited about this company and their products. "

name: Charcoal Soap
description:
Say hello to your new face wash!
Although many of my customers with acne prone skin love this soap I also recommend it to anyone that wants fresh beautiful skin. If your skin is very sensitive but also troublesome I highly recommend trying my Big Pumpkin soap.

Tea Tree oil and activated charcoal absorb excess oil to leave dull, oily, and troubled skin clean and refreshed. Due to federal regulations I cannot say what this soap will actually do for your skin. You can, however, read my Etsy feedback to see what my customers have to say about how it has helped their skin.

+ Tea Tree Oil - A powerful oil that kills bacteria known to cause breakouts
+ Lavender Oil - Calms and neutralizes the skin while also adding to an overall natural glow
+ Bamboo Activated Charcoal - Pulls dirt and toxins out like a magnet.

Bringing you fresh, all natural cold processed soap using organic ingredients.

ingredients: saponified; organic olive oil, organic coconut oil, organic sustainable palm oil, organic sunflower oil, organic castor oil, organic unrefined shea butter, purified water, essential oils, and bamboo charcoal

4 oz bar

Customer Feedback

- Four days after replacing my facial cleanser with your bamboo charcoal soap my skin is noticeably clearer and less inflamed. Definitely buying again in the future.

- My skin has not felt so soft in years! I have very sensitive skin and this paired with the Healing balm is wonderful! I use this to take my makeup off at the end of the day, and it is not harsh on your skin but gets your skin sooo clean and O'so soft! I LOVE THIS SOAP!

-LOVE this. I've had it for about 3 days and have used it every day (one time). My face isn't dry or anything. Smells fabulous... calms my skin.... breakouts seem to be disappearing. Definitely worth it!

-Love this. I've been using natural face soaps and washes only on my skin for ~10 years now (I became severely allergic to most of the stuff that contains synthetic chemicals). So over the years I've run into some good soaps and cleansers and some not so good ones. This is a GOOD one! It leaves skin feeling clean but not irritated. Will be buying again.

name: Organic Dead Sea Clay Soap + Lavender Mint
description:
+ Dead Sea Clay - has long been used to benefit the skin. It is known for gentle exfoliation, fight free radicals, absorb dirt/toxins, purify, tone/tighten skin, sooth eczema, and hydrate the skin.

+ Lavender Oil - Calms and neutralizes the skin while also adding to an overall natural glow.

Suitable for all skin types as a face and body bar.

Bringing you fresh, all natural cold processed soap using organic ingredients.
 
ingredients: saponified organic olive oil, organic coconut oil, organic sustainable palm oil, organic sunflower oil, organic castor oil, organic unrefined shea butter, purified water, essential oils, dead sea clay, and lavender buds

name: Vetiver Vanilla Soap
description:
Deep, smoky, earthy, and warm peppery describe this warm and alluring custom blended soap.

Give your skin the care it deserves with this gentle organic soap that appeals to both women and men. Warm and Alluring with added benefits of Cambrian Blue Clay imported from Siberia, this soap detoxifies the skin and regenerates skin cells.

4 oz bar

Ingredients: saponified organic olive oil, organic coconut oil, organic sustainable palm oil, organic sunflower oil, organic castor oil, organic unrefined shea butter, essential oil, fragrance oil, cambrian blue clay, juniper berries

name: Organic French Pink Clay & Peppermint Soap
description:
Our top selling soap and for good reason. This pink clay soap is like no other. We've added peppermint essential oil for an extra kick. It's like having a mini spa visit every time you use it.

Bringing you fresh, handmade, all natural soap using organic ingredients that is safe and gentle. Suitable for all skin types. Can be used as a body and face soap.

French Pink Clay - is known for drawing impurities out of skin, cell renewal, skin rejuvenation, and improving elasticity.

Peppermint Essential Oil - A natural antiseptic, relieves headaches, and helps fight acne.

4 - 4.5 oz bar

Ingredients: saponified organic extra virgin olive oil, organic babassu oil, organic sustainable palm oil, organic macadamia nut oil, organic castor oil, purified water, peppermint essential oil, and french pink clay

name: Lime n de Coconut Organic Soap
description:
Itching for a little piece of the tropics? I know I am! Introducing Lime n de Coconut soap. Just saying the name puts an extra pep in my step.

+ Dead Sea Clay - has long been used to benefit the skin. It is known for gentle exfoliation, fight free radicals, absorb dirt/toxins, purify, tone/tighten skin, sooth eczema, and hydrate the skin.

This soap is 99% natural as it does have a little bit of fragrance oil in it.

ingredients: saponified; organic olive oil, organic coconut oil, organic sustainable palm oil,  organic sunflower oil, organic castor oil, organic unrefined shea butter, purified water, essential oil, fragrance oil, and dead sea clay

4 oz bar

name: Southern Sexy Soap
description:
My southern sexy blend has made it to my soap line. Yeah! Hints of cedarwood, amber, sicilian lemon, southern orange, jasmine, and a dash of pink grapefruit blend to make one amazing scented soap! Now with Cambrian Blue Clay.

Bringing you fresh, all natural cold processed soap using organic ingredients.

ingredients: saponified organic olive oil, organic coconut oil, organic sustainable palm oil, organic sunflower oil, organic castor oil, organic unrefined shea butter, purified water, essential oils, and cambrian blue clay

4oz bar

name: The Sheriff - A Very Manly Soap Organic
description:
Give your skin the care it deserves with this gentle all natural organic men's soap for the manliest of men. Named after my beloved grandfather, "The Sheriff", this custom handmade soap cuts through even the toughest grime and leaves the skin gently moisturized. Made with Cambrian Blue Clay imported from Siberia, this soap detoxifies the skin and regenerates skin cells. It carries a unique blend of essential oils that gives it a scent similar to the earthy musk of the forest after a burst of rainfall. This 4 oz. bar fills the hand generously and works up into a fabulous lather. It is ideal for the man who wants to pamper himself without feeling "girly". And it makes a wonderful 'boyfriend soap' for the girl who loves to smell like her man.

5 oz bar
 
Ingredients: saponified organic olive oil, organic coconut oil, organic sustainable palm oil, organic sunflower oil, organic castor oil, organic unrefined shea butter, custom blended essential oils, and cambrian blue clay.

name: Coffee Scrub Soap
description:
Start your day the right way with a jolt of java. This handmade organic coffee scrub soap is one of our top-sellers. It is custom handmade and features organic coffee, shredded loofah, pumice, and apricot shells. The scent is purely intoxicating and you'll love how it feels when caressed across your skin. It provides exfoliation that removes dead skin cells. This generous 4 oz. bar fits in the palm of your hand and can also smooth rough heels, elbows and knees. It also makes an exceptional soap for gardener's or "foodies" as it makes quick work of grime and annihilates strong scents. It is a custom handmade original from Soap Revolt.

Bringing you fresh, all natural cold processed soap using organic ingredients. Please note that this particular soap is 99% natural. It does have a bit of turkish mocha fragrance oil in it.

ingredients: saponified organic olive oil, organic coconut oil, organic sustainable palm oil, organic sunflower oil, organic castor oil, organic unrefined shea butter, purified water, organic ground coffee, loofah, pumice, apricot shells, fragrance oil.

4oz bar

name: Lavender + Chamomile Soap
description:
I've taken my lavender soap and boosted it with chamomile, french pink clay, and cambrian blue clay. Like all my soaps it produces big bubbles and lather.

Bringing you fresh, all natural cold processed soap using organic ingredients.

ingredients: saponified organic olive oil, organic coconut oil, organic sustainable palm oil, organic sunflower oil, organic castor oil, organic unrefined shea butter, purified water, essential oils, pink french clay, cambrian blue clay & chamomile petals.

4oz bar

name: Soap Saver
description: A must have accessory for all natural soap bars. This little gem will extend the life of your soap bars. The soap is elevated keeping it drained between uses. To further extend your soap bar keep direct spray of water off soap while in the shower.

name: Shower Oil 8oz
description:
Say hello to your soft side!
Use this oil in the shower for the ultimate hydration. Loaded with apricot and macadamia nut oil for super soft skin. Simply apply after cleansing, soak in, lightly rinse (if desired), pat dry, and enjoy! Providing a healthy option for your skin and the environment.
Available in 5 scents.
This also makes a wonderful treat to stash in a guest bathroom to really make your visitors feel welcome. This is a custom handmade original from Soap Revolt

8 oz bottle

Ingredients: organic apricot kernel oil, organic macadamia nut oil, organic avocado oil, rosehip seed oil, essential oil and/or fragrance oil.

*Lime n de coconut is 99% natural
*Vetiver + Vanilla is 99% natural
Lavender + Chamomile, Lavender + Mint, and Orange Blossom are 100% natural

name: Shower Oil 4oz
description:
Say hello to your soft side!
Use this oil in the shower for the ultimate hydration. Loaded with apricot and macadamia nut oil for super soft skin. Simply apply after cleansing, soak in, lightly rinse (if desired), pat dry, and enjoy! Providing a healthy option for your skin and the environment.
Available in 5 scents.
This also makes a wonderful treat to stash in a guest bathroom to really make your visitors feel welcome. This is a custom handmade original from Soap Revolt

4 oz bottle

Ingredients: organic apricot kernel oil, organic macadamia nut oil, organic avocado oil, rosehip seed oil, essential oil and/or fragrance oil.

*Lime n de coconut is 99% natural
*Vetiver + Vanilla is 99% natural
Lavender + Chamomile, Lavender + Mint, and Orange Blossom are 100% natural

name: Natural Organic Body Oil
description:
Pamper your skin and moisturize it to perfection with my custom hand blended body oil. Handmade in artisan detail, you can choose from seven (7) delightful scents that will invigorate your spirit while quenching your parched skin. Each one of my versatile blends features a balance of oils that will leave your skin supple and lightly scented. You can use this body oil right after the shower while your skin is still warm. This body oil absorbs quickly without leaving any greasiness behind. Alternatively, you can pour it straight into the tub and soak up all the goodness while relaxing after a long day. This also makes a wonderful treat to stash in a guest bathroom to really make your visitors feel welcome. This is a custom handmade original from Soap Revolt.

The lavender + tea tree combination is highly recommended as an all natural moisturizer for the face. I don't recommend the other essential oils for use on the face. You can also use the lavender + tea tree for the oil cleansing method if desired.

+ Avocado Oil - high is sterlins which reduce age spots, help heal sun damage and scars, softens skin with superior moisturizing effect, rejuvenation of skin, and increases collagen

+ Hemp Seed Oil - a natural humectant that contains 80% essential fatty acid which is the highest of any plant. Hemp matches our own skin lipids so closely that it is able to penetrate inside the cells to lubricate between them. These EFAs have been proven to play a preventative role in skin aging and healthy moisture balance. Offers relief to acne, minor abrasions, psoriasis and eczema. 

+ Sunflower Oil - Rich in oleic acids, vitamin a d & e, known for ability to reduce the appearance of find lines and wrinkles

Choose from - 

Orange Blossom
Lavender & Chamomile
Vanilla & Orange
Southern Sexy
Lime n de Coconut  - 99% natural due to fragrance oil
Lavender & Mint
Lavender + Tea Tree - FACE Moisturizer
Vetiver + Vanilla

4 oz bottle

Ingredients: organic avacado oil, organic hemp seed oil, organic sunflower oil, & essential oils

Shipping:
I ship the same day or next day after your order is placed. I don't like waiting for all the lovely items I order online so I don't want you to wait either!

This body oil absorbs quickly without leaving any greasiness behind. Alternatively, you can pour it straight into the tub and soak up all the goodness while relaxing after a long day. This also makes a wonderful treat to stash in a guest bathroom to really make your visitors feel welcome. This is a custom handmade original from Soap Revolt.

The lavender + tea tree combination is highly recommended as an all natural moisturizer for the face. I don't recommend the other essential oils for use on the face. You can also use the lavender + tea tree for the oil cleansing method if desired.

+ Avocado Oil - high is sterlins which reduce age spots, help heal sun damage and scars, softens skin with superior moisturizing effect, rejuvenation of skin, and increases collagen

+ Hemp Seed Oil - a natural humectant that contains 80% essential fatty acid which is the highest of any plant. Hemp matches our own skin lipids so closely that it is able to penetrate inside the cells to lubricate between them. These EFAs have been proven to play a preventative role in skin aging and healthy moisture balance. Offers relief to acne, minor abrasions, psoriasis and eczema. 

+ Sunflower Oil - Rich in oleic acids, vitamin a d & e, known for ability to reduce the appearance of find lines and wrinkles

Choose from - 

Orange Blossom
Lavender & Chamomile
Vanilla & Orange
Southern Sexy
Lime n de Coconut
Lavender & Mint
Lavender + Tea Tree - FACE Moisturizer
Vetiver + Vanilla

.25 oz sample bottle - second picture shows full size bottle

Ingredients: organic avacado oil, organic hemp seed oil, organic sunflower oil, & essential oils

I ship the same day or next day after your order is placed. I don't like waiting for all the lovely items I order online so I don't want you to wait either!

description:

Soothe and moisturize your lips naturally. Made with organic shea butter and cocoa butter that glides on, hydrates, and seals in moisture like no other! Your lips will feel amazing!

If you are using a lip balm that's not ALL natural throw it out and order one of these. Besides being packed with all things that are good; our lip balm will not dry out your lips requiring continuous application.

description:

Peppermint, Cappuccino, Lavender + Vanilla, & Mango Peach

name: Organic Solid Lotion Bar
description:
A solid lotion bar that fits easily into your purse or pocket. These lotion bars are amazing. They offer the right amount of hydration without feeling greasy. Pop it out of the tin and rub between your hands or on your skin.

Bringing you fresh, handmade, all natural lotion using organic ingredients. Suitable for all skin types. 
* Lime n de Coconut is 99% natural - it has a bit of fragrance oil in it.

For best results avoid leaving these lotion bars in prolonged sun/heat as they will melt.
 
Ingredients: organic QAI cocoa butter, organic unrefined shea butter, organic bees wax, organic sweet almond oil, and essential oils.

name: Natural Lotion - Large Size
description:
The Body Brick Lotion Bar
 
Solid lotion bar in a reusable tin. Our lotion bars offer the right amount of hydration without feeling greasy. Remove from tin and apply to skin. The lotion bar heats up when rubbed on skin so it glides on and melts into your skin.
Providing a healthy alternative for your skin and the environment.
 
Ingredients: organic QAI cocoa butter, organic unrefined shea butter, organic bees wax, organic sweet almond oil, and essential oil.

name: Organic Whipped Moisturizer
description:
This is an extraordinary skin hydrating moisturizer. Glides on easily and never leaves you feeling greasy. When used daily your skin will be extremely soft and oh so touchable. A little bit goes a long way!

You can also use this as a face moisturizer. Use sparingly on the face and add more as needed.

Available in:
Spanish Lavender
Lavender & Mint
Orange Blossom
Vetiver & Vanilla (99% natural)
Lemongrass

Ingredients: shea butter, babassu oil, essential oil(s)

4oz 
Allow two days before shipped; made on order.

name: Tattoo Balm
description:
If you are looking for a tattoo aftercare product this is THE balm for tattoo healing. This balm will help soothe and heal new tattoos. I personally use this tat balm for my new tattoos.

It's so important to keep your new tattoo moisturized for the very best results. Forget about using petroleum based products such as A&D. And best of all it is 100% Natural.
 
This is a fresh handmade 100% natural tattoo ointment.
 
Testimonial:
"Hi! I actually had bought it for my boyfriend for a recent tattoo. He has tried multiple different kinds of balm and creams and said that yours was the best he's had! Also, you had sent a lip balm along with it, and I'm hooked on it! It's amazing! Thanks again"

To use: Apply liberally 3 times per day with clean fingers. Rub in gently. Even though your mom said to always share...you shouldn't share this one.

Shipping:
I ship the same day or next day after your order is placed. I don't like waiting for all the lovely items I order online so I don't want you to wait either!

Ingredients: Calendula infused olive oil, beeswax, and lavender essential oil.

2oz volume

name: Big Healing Balm
description:
Be prepared for all eventualities with this wondrous tin of my all natural healing balm. This best-selling all natural healing balm is a phenomenal product that has a wide range of uses. You simply never know when a painful trouble spot is going to arise. This healing balm is sensational for treating acne, dry skin, chapped lips, cuts and scrapes, bug bites and so much more. It is packaged in a convenient tin and is delivered in solid form. Rub it into those painful areas that could use a little TLC and you'll be amazed at how well it heals. A little bit of this healing balm goes a long way. Keep several on hand in your home and in the car so that you are always ready to tackle trouble spots at the onset. It is a custom handmade original from Soap Revolt.

Large tin 4oz volume

Customer Reviews (Etsy Feedback)

- I really like using this as my morning soap (Pumpkin soap). I use the healing balm with it and it is such an amazing combination! I tried using LUSH products before but my skin got soooo rough! All of these products make your skin so soft and clean! My complexion is more clear also, so I have started using less make up! WIN-WIN-WIN!!!

-Hey Jean - We have been using your healing balm on my daughter's hands that were really cracked and dried out. We have tried all different types of lotions and vaseline in the past, but nothing worked. In just a week, her hands are almost all cleared up. Congrats on a great product.
